ministry: MINISTRY OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT

banner.description: A banner of the ministry's crest and motto, reflecting commitment to affordable and inclusive housing.

welcome_message.content: Welcome to the Ministry of Housing and Urban Development, Imo State. Under the leadership of Commissioner Nicholas Anayo Amaefule, we are dedicated to urban renewal, mass housing, and sustainable development in alignment with our state’s vision.

commissioner_profile.name: Nicholas Anayo Amaefule
commissioner_profile.title: Commissioner for Lands, Survey, Housing, and Urban Development, Imo State
commissioner_profile.background: Appointed as part of the current Executive Council—leads housing policy and urban development initiatives.
key_achievements: Oversaw repeal and modernization of the Housing Corporation Edict 1976
Coordinated mass housing schemes in key zones (Umuoma Nekede, Anara, Mgbidi)
Engaged with professional bodies, including NIOB, to strengthen building standards and collaboration
commissioner_profile.commitment: Delivering affordable housing, transparency, and institutional reform.

about_us.mission_statement: To deliver affordable and sustainable housing solutions through strategic partnerships, policy reform, and urban regeneration.
about_us.vision_statement: Creating housing-secure, inclusive, and modern communities across Imo State.

organizational_chart.honourable_commissioner: Chief policy maker and head of ministry operations
organizational_chart.permanent_secretary: Executive administrator overseeing internal department coordination
support_staff: Project Engineers, Site Supervisors, Zonal Coordinators

key_departments.Housing Projects & Development: Oversees design and execution of housing estates
key_departments.Urban Renewal Department: Leads slum upgrading and redevelopment programs
key_departments.Rural Housing Department: Focuses on housing in underserved rural areas
key_departments.Planning & Strategy Department: Conducts research and formulates housing policies
key_departments.Legal & Regulatory Services Department: Ensures compliance with building codes and regulations
key_departments.Finance & Accounts Department: Manages budgets, revenue, and financial operations
key_departments.Procurement & Supplies Department: Manages transparent sourcing of materials and services

departments_agencies.assurance_speech: Every department under this Ministry remains devoted to transparency, professionalism, and delivering housing solutions that meet the needs of all Imolites.
